mapper.select: SELECT o.oNo, o.mId, a.actId, m.mName, a.actName, o.oQty, a.actImg, o.oPrice, o.oPrice * o.oQty as summoney , o.arCHECK, AD.* FROM MEMBER M , ACTIVITY A, ORDERS O , ActEventDate AD WHERE m.mId =o.mId AND a.actId = o.actId AND o.mId=#{mId} AND o.otype =#{oType} AND o.eNo = AD.eNo ORDER BY o.oNo
SELECT NVL(SUM(oPrice*oQty),0) money FROM ORDERS O , ACTIVITY A WHERE o.actId = a.actId AND o.mId=#{mId} and o.oType = 'ORDERS'
mapper.update: UPDATE ORDERS SET oType ='ACTIVITY' WHERE mId = #{mId} AND oType = 'ORDERS'
